title: BRIEF-Herc Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $7.44
text: February 28, 2018 / 11:55 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Herc Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $7.44 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Herc Holdings Inc: * HERC HOLDINGS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES FULL YEAR GUIDANCE FOR 2018 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $7.44 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 21.3 PERCENT TO $491.7 MILLION * PROVIDES GUIDANCE OF $620 MILLION TO $655 MILLION FOR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA * 2017 Q4 INCLUDED AN ESTIMATED 1-TIME NET BENEFIT OF $207.1 MILLION WITH ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 * FOR 2018, SEES NET FLEET CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $525 MILLION TO $575 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $454.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
